long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In analysis, creates additionnal keyboard shortcuts to simulate inaccurracies/mistakes/blunders/request-analysis/learn-from-your-mistakes/next clicks.

I created that before my PR to Lichess ( https://github.com/lichess-org/lila/pull/12443 ), but since I don't have reviews and things don't move, I'm releasing a client-side Chrome plugin that does the same thing.

Note that the screenshot isn't what you'll see but is what my PR is trying to add.
